message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I get $6000 and you get $4000. We both lose money if this drags on.

I think we can do better than that. I'm willing to give you a fair share, but I also want to make sure I get a decent amount. How about we split it 5500/4500? This way we both get more than your previous offer.
Bob, I appreciate you trying, but your offer wasn't fair considering the inflation. I'll take a small hit to move things along. $5700 for me, $4300 for you. This is a good deal while it lasts!
